Header: Two women kidnapped and gang-raped by 12 in Agra, India
Content: Two dancers of a music and dance troupe have being kidnapped and gang-raped at gun-point by 12 men in Uttar Pradeshâ€™s Agra, India. Two of their attackers were arrested. These two men were the organizers of the show the two women took part in. According to Indian media, the incident has taken place on June 25. Another woman who was also with the rape survivors has said that she was not attacked as she was pregnant. The organizers have offered transport to the women. But, instead they were taken to a house and sexually abused by 10 or 12 men. The first two suspects were arrested after the girls complained to the police.
